content:
The chunk is part of the `DirectButton` class initialization in a Python document, defining an option `'pressEffect'` that determines whether text/graphics appear to move when the button is clicked. This setting is merged with default options during object creation.

# Do the text/graphics appear to move when the button is clicked
            ('pressEffect',     1,         DGG.INITOPT),
        )
        # Merge keyword options with default options
        self.defineoptions(kw, optiondefs)
